title: Drawing
medium: Brush and black wash, pen and black ink on paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: Dorothy Fulniss (?)
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite: New Adaptable Gas Cooker
description: Cartoon-like drawing in two parts. Above, a tall woman in black cooking over a gas cooker to her right. Below, a short, fat woman in a dotted apron, at the same type of cooker. In both cases, the burner is elbow level, with an adjustable stilt.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing. Brush and black wash, pen and black ink on paper. 1947-131-119.
